Headline: මහවැසි මහ සුළං කොළඹට කළ විපතින් කොටසක්(photos)

comments.comment: International media & weather forecasts warned SL of this at least a day before. Our MET department announced officially to SL citizens not to panic and no storm would come. After the wind hit Colombo, the same MET department issued a warning at 8:00 p.m. last night. Go home all officials of MET department. You have been given with a very large and financially valuable land at the center of Colombo with most of necessary facilities (I have been in there), just to be idle doing nothing. If you do not know how to predict, at least have some respect for people who does and have a tentative warning at least for people to get prepared after referring to international web sites. There are plenty of sites to track. In this IT era, you do not have to look at the sky to predict.
